mapper.select: select h.hotels_name, b.booking_code, b.booking_date, b.booking_check_in, b.booking_check_out, b.booking_total_price from hotels h, booking b where b.member_id = #{memberId} and b.hotels_code = h.hotels_code and (b.booking_status = 'B' or b.booking_status = 'R')

select h.hotels_name, b.booking_code, b.room_sort, b.booking_date, b.booking_cancel_date, b.booking_check_in, b.booking_check_out, b.booking_total_price from hotels h, booking b where b.member_id = #{memberId} and b.hotels_code = h.hotels_code and b.booking_status = 'C'
select b.*, h.hotels_name from booking b, hotels h where b.booking_code = #{bookingCode} and b.hotels_code = h.hotels_code
